alert.note: Alert for Colquitt (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 18 at 7:53PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Colquitt County through 845 PM EDT... At 753 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Riverside, or near Moultrie, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Moultrie, Riverside, Berlin, Moultrie Municipal A/P, Autreyville, Bay, Center Hill, Spence Airport, Murphy and South Moultrie. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
